title: Does the new runes boost true damage?
body: The new keystone rune of Precision, Press the Attack says the target will get more damage "from all source". But I found that the damage of Vayne's w cannot be boosted by this runes. Is that a bug? Or true damage cannot be boosted?

replies.body:
I cannot confirm or deny, I am afraid, but I believe %damage increases AND %damage reductions are ignored by true damage.

You can still use runes to optimize true damage though. You can get more attack speed for vayne, more hp or cdr or ap for cho and darius, etc.
true damage cannot by amplified by anything apart from predetermined scalings.
This is the reason. More recently, there have been some exceptions, but as a general rule, true damage is completely unaffected by damage modifiers, so runes shouldn't be able to amplify it either.
True damage is true damage. It can't be amped up or defended against by any means
